title: Hour 1: The Michael Jordan Of Weatherman
description:
Stugotz pays tribute to the GOAT, Jim Cantore. Witty and Mike have their information and Stu has his gut, and all three are ready to bet on our Thursday Thunder single game parlay as we continue to break down Dolphins-Bengals. Plus, Russell Wilson and Subway have combined for "The Dangerwich," but their new commercial has us asking questions...
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
